ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 347
ygData.msgSnippet: ... but ... And there are many special weapons a Bard can use. You are wrong if you think there are less Bard-only equipment than Cleric-only equipment.  And
ygData.messageBody:
> Message: 4
> Date: Fri, 17 Sep 1999 15:35:02 -0600
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
> Subject: RE: Clerics
>
> Actually I play a cleric and a bard as well. Several of the bard/rogue
> items are or already have been realigned to be rogue only due to rogue
> complaints. And yes the primarily found Cleric weapon is Cleric/Paladin
but
> there are many special weapons easily obtainable for clerics like the
> Bloodforge hammer.

And there are many special weapons a Bard can use.

You are wrong if you think there are less Bard-only equipment than
Cleric-only equipment. And Bards hve a much larger selection of weapons to
choose from that clerics.

> High elves and halflings are the low for cleric hitpoints, half-elves and
> humans are the high for bard hitpoints. Our dwarf cleric has near 400hp
to
> my 337 and he is 2 levels below me with no points added to stamina and no
> boosting items (just like me). His AC is also 30 points higher since his
> strength is 100+ with minimal point investment. Maybe clerics in general
> only make slightly better or equal tanks to us, but dwarf clerics
definitely
> make better tanks than any bard.

I see your real problem. You are only level 16 and the cleric is 14. You
have no idea how things happen work out later on. At higher levels Clerics
are just not melee capable. Clerics are more efficeint when they meditate
in battle. At your low levels, clerics do make decent tanks. But this
ability goes away at higher levels.

> In addition his full suit of armor cost less than 150pp. I on the other
> hand have one piece alone that cost me that much (silvered bracer).

This makes no sense at all. You could equip yourself very similar to the
Dwarf for around the same prices. But just because you bought one piece of
rare equipment doesn't mean that bards are worse off.

My cleric just paid 800pp for a CG Shield. I also paid 600pp for two +WIS
rings. And around 100pp for some earrings.
